entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, a wizard who is about to leave with Hagrid. ("Harry, where's Hedwig?", "He felt ashamed of himself as the tears stung his eyes.")

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: A gamekeeper at Hogwarts and a close friend of Harry. ("Wait a moment," said Hagrid, looking around.)

entities.name: hedwig
entities.description: Harry's owl companion who got hit. ("She . . . she got hit," said Harry.)

entities.name: ted tonks
entities.description: A wizard who is warning Hagrid about the hairbrush glowing bright blue. ("Hagrid!" said Ted Tonks warningly, as the hairbrush glowed bright blue)

entities.name: mr tonks
entities.description: Ted Tonks' father or a person with the same last name. ("Seconds later Harry's feet slammed into Mr. Tonks.")

relationships.description: Hagrid is accompanying Harry as they are about to leave with the Portkey. ("Wait a moment," said Hagrid, looking around.)
Hagrid is nearby Ted Tonks as he is warning him about the hairbrush glowing bright blue. ("Hagrid!" said Ted Tonks warningly, as the hairbrush glowed bright blue)
Harry is the owner of Hedwig who got hit. ("She . . . she got hit," said Harry.)
